stack:stack.stack:script:
PALLETS="stacki-5.0-sles12.x86_64.disk1.iso SLE-12-SP2-Server-DVD-x86_64-GM-DVD1.iso"
mkdir -p /export/replicant/pallets
for i in $PALLETS do curl -o /export/replicant/pallets/$i http://&yumserver;/install/replicant/&Kickstart_PrivateHostname;/$i /opt/stack/bin/stack add pallet /export/replicant/pallets/$i done
/opt/stack/bin/stack enable pallet %
mkdir -p /export/replicant/CSVs
curl -o /export/replicant/CSVs/networks.csv http://&yumserver;/install/replicant/&Kickstart_PrivateHostname;/networks.csv /opt/stack/bin/stack load networkfile file=/export/replicant/CSVs/networks.csv
curl -o /export/replicant/CSVs/hosts.csv http://&yumserver;/install/replicant/&Kickstart_PrivateHostname;/hosts.csv /opt/stack/bin/stack load hostfile file=/export/replicant/CSVs/hosts.csv
/opt/stack/bin/stack report host network localhost \ | /opt/stack/bin/stack report script | bash
/opt/stack/bin/stack report host interface localhost \ | /opt/stack/bin/stack report script | bash
/opt/stack/bin/stack report host route localhost \ | /opt/stack/bin/stack report script | bash
